publishedAction.name: topOrderedProductsChart

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT public.order.*, location.address1, person.first_name, person.last_name, order_status.label AS status
FROM public.order
INNER JOIN location ON public.order.shipping_address = location.id
INNER JOIN order_status ON public.order.order_status_id = order_status.id
INNER JOIN account ON public.order.account_id = account.id
INNER JOIN person ON account.customer_id = person.id;

SELECT public.order.*, location.address1, person.first_name, person.last_name, order_status.label AS status
FROM public.order
INNER JOIN location ON public.order.shipping_address = location.id
INNER JOIN order_status ON public.order.order_status_id = order_status.id
INNER JOIN account ON public.order.account_id = account.id
INNER JOIN person ON account.customer_id = person.id;

unpublishedAction.name: revenueChart

publishedAction.name: revenueChart

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
  ol.product_variant_id, 
  COUNT(*) as variant_count, 
  pv.product_id,  
  pv.price,
	p.name
FROM order_line ol 
LEFT JOIN product_variant pv 
  ON ol.product_variant_id = pv.id
LEFT JOIN product p ON pv.product_id = p.id
GROUP BY ol.product_variant_id, pv.product_id, pv.price, p.name
ORDER BY variant_count DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT 
  ol.product_variant_id, 
  COUNT(*) as variant_count, 
  pv.product_id,  
  pv.price,
	p.name
FROM order_line ol 
LEFT JOIN product_variant pv 
  ON ol.product_variant_id = pv.id
LEFT JOIN product p ON pv.product_id = p.id
GROUP BY ol.product_variant_id, pv.product_id, pv.price, p.name
ORDER BY variant_count DESC
LIMIT 5;

unpublishedAction.name: generateInvoice

publishedAction.name: generateInvoice

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
  to_char(created, 'YYYY-MM') AS month,
  SUM(total) AS total
FROM
  "order"
WHERE
  created >= date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '11 months')
GROUP BY
  to_char(created, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY
  month;

SELECT
  to_char(created, 'YYYY-MM') AS month,
  SUM(total) AS total
FROM
  "order"
WHERE
  created >= date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '11 months')
GROUP BY
  to_char(created, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY
  month;

unpublishedAction.name: getOrders

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT public.order.*, location.address1, person.first_name, person.last_name, person.phone, person.email, order_status.label AS status
FROM public.order
INNER JOIN location ON public.order.shipping_address = location.id
INNER JOIN order_status ON public.order.order_status_id = order_status.id
INNER JOIN account ON public.order.account_id = account.id
INNER JOIN person ON account.customer_id = person.id
ORDER BY id ASC
LIMIT {{tbl_orders.pageSize}} OFFSET {{(tbl_orders.pageNo - 1) * tbl_orders.pageSize}};

unpublishedAction.name: updateOrderShipping

actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE "order"
  SET order_status_id = 3,
carrier = {{sel_carrier.selectedOptionValue}},
shipping = {{inp_shippingRate.text}},
shipping_date = {{dat_shippingDate.formattedDate}},
eta = {{dat_eta.formattedDate}},
weight_kg = {{inp_kg.text || 0}},
weight_lbs = {{inp_lbs.text || 0}},
width = {{inp_width.text || 0}},
height = {{inp_height.text || 0}},
length = {{inp_length.text || 0}},
tracking_no = {{inp_trackingId.text}}
  WHERE id = {{ appsmith.store.order.Order_id }};

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT order_line.*, product_variant.sku, product_variant.price, product.image, "order".total, "order".taxes, "order".subtotal, product.name
FROM order_line 
INNER JOIN product_variant ON order_line.product_variant_id = product_variant.id
INNER JOIN "order" ON order_line.order_id = "order".id
INNER JOIN product ON product_variant.product_id = product.id
WHERE order_id = {{appsmith.store.order.Order_id}};

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT order_line.*, product_variant.sku, product_variant.price, product.image, "order".total, "order".taxes, "order".subtotal, product.name
FROM order_line 
INNER JOIN product_variant ON order_line.product_variant_id = product_variant.id
INNER JOIN "order" ON order_line.order_id = "order".id
INNER JOIN product ON product_variant.product_id = product.id
WHERE order_id = {{appsmith.store.order.Order_id}};

jsonPathKeys: appsmith.store.order.Order_id
